CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(amc__Billing_Type__c, "Fixed Price"), amc__Hours_Completed_Value_Cost__c + amc__Expense_Summary__c + amc__Actual_Project_Expenses__c, amc__Hours_Completed_Value_Cost__c + amc__Expense_Summary__c + amc__Actual_Project_Expenses_Non_Billable__c)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Provides a cost summary using Hours Completed Value (Cost) + Material Costs Completed + Actual Project Expenses
CustomField.label: Total Project Cost (Actual)
